content: **free lalylala easter bunny mod kit rita the rabbit ** this is just the pattern for the ears and the easter eggs not for the whole doll when i fell into that rabbit hole the other day i came back with another freebie especially for all of you who already own one of the lalylala doll patterns let s follow the white rabbit again and crochet yourself this lovely bunny named rita but what s a bunny on easter without some motley eggs right - very sad so i wrote down and published pattern for crocheted easter eggs too - to make you and your bunny happy **free bunny mod kit and easter eggs crochet pattern**
